title: paDDa bhATu
sahitya:
paDDa bhATu cAladA Ivaraku pAmarampu manasA


anupallavi

  goTTurIti kanna iNTlu dUri kUDu bhujinci kovvuna tirugucu


caraNam 1    dAra sutulanu pOSincuTa korakai dhana lObhula valayamu tirigi 
vArivalla napA ninda tagili balu vancakuTani sari IvAralu naucu
    caraNam 2    vara kAntala valanu tagili tana vAriyotta meNDu dhanamu kaikoni 
tArumAru panula dUri ceDi bahu taNTa mAriyani taralO navvucu
    caraNam 3    irugu porugu lEmAruTha jUci iNTlanu jorabaDu vELala ganabaTi 
tarumi goTTu samayammuna veri tanamu dAlci talavambuga tirugucu
    caraNam 4    kOrina kOrkela nosageDu shrI gOpAla dAsanutuni padamula 
vAramu pUjincuvArika-bhISTa varamu kalugunanai teliyaka tirugucu
